    • Field Summary

      java.util.HashMap AllWords 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stemmer()
      establishes connection to the WordNet database

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Stem(java.lang.String word)
      Stem a single word tries to look up the word in the AllWords HashMap If the word is not found it is stemmed with WordNet and put into AllWords
      java.util.Vector Stem(java.util.Vector words)
      performs Stem on each element in the given Vector

        public java.lang.String Stem(java.lang.String word)
        Stem a single word tries to look up the word in the AllWords HashMap If the word is not found it is stemmed with WordNet and put into AllWords
